articles.content: SACRAMENTO, Calif. BYUs Casey Clinger and Brandon Garnica finished ninth and 10th, respectively, in the 10,000-meter run at Wednesday nights NCAA West Preliminaries to advance to the NCAA Outdoor Tra… [+2984 chars]

articles.author: Ryan Henkel
articles.title: Carolina Hurricanes swept by Florida Panthers in Eastern Conference Final - Canes Country
articles.description: The Carolina Hurricanes lost 4-3 to the Florida Panthers Wednesday night at FLA Live Arena as their season came to a close.
articles.content: After a gutsy postseason run, the Carolina Hurricanes have once again been left bitter and disappointed after a 4-3 loss to the Florida Panthers ended their season in a 4-0 sweep in the Eastern Confe… [+4114 chars]

articles.description: JACKSONVILLE, Fla. - Senior Cole Beck broke his own 100m outdoor school record at Virginia Tech clocking in a time of 10.05 in the first round …
